mapper.select: SELECT sugang_reg.*, lecture_info.lec_name, user.user_name , lecture_info.lec_ex, lecture_info.lec_start_date ,lecture_info.lec_end_date FROM sugang_reg INNER JOIN lecture_info ON sugang_reg.lec_num = lecture_info.lec_num INNER JOIN user ON sugang_reg.USER_NO = user.USER_NO

SELECT sugang_reg.*, lecture_info.lec_name, user.user_name , lecture_info.lec_ex, lecture_info.lec_start_date ,lecture_info.lec_end_date FROM sugang_reg INNER JOIN lecture_info ON sugang_reg.lec_num = lecture_info.lec_num INNER JOIN user ON sugang_reg.USER_NO = user.USER_NO WHERE sugang_reg.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT cm.* FROM lecture_info li LEFT JOIN contents_manage cm ON li.lec_num = cm.lec_num WHERE li.lec_num = #{lecNum}
